name: Kamigawa [Spirits River]
description:
In Nut-Wombat's "Kamigawa(japanese for Spirits River)" from 2010 you play the role of the samurai disciple Sven Hansen.Hes master gets abducted by the evil elder dragon and the Crystal of Dragon gets stolen.Embark on a thrilling journey to the Far East Kamigawa, to save your master and bring back the crystal.


Kill the four Samurai of the Seiryu, an evil organization which controlls the seaport Kamigawa and the area around it. Fight against Shen Long Animal and his predator army.Find out where the elder dragon is and defeat him...

  • TITLE:"Kamigawa"
  • GENRE:"JRPG/Hack 'n' Slash"
  • THEME:"Anime"
  • PLATFORM:"PC"
  • LANGUAGE:"GERMAN/ENGLISH"
  • PLAYING TIME:"ca. 2h"
  • DEVELOPER:"Nut-Wombat Studios"
  • YEAR:"2010"
  • EXTRAS:
    1. Training
    2. Jump'n Run
    3. shooting range
    4. Windmill(Bonuslevel)
